oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mallory-Neely House
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “The Mallory-Neely House, 652 Adams Ave., Memphis, Tennessee. Located in a magnificent southern setting, this three-story, twenty-five room home with much of the original furniture intact preserves for public viewing an elegant example of the décor and atmosphere that reflect the Victorian Era at its best.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: museums; Pink Palace Museum; Pink Palace Family of Museums; residences; Victorian houses; midtown; Mallory-Neely House;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lancaster, Don
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Don Lancaster Photography – 2930 Airways, Memphis, Tenn. 38116
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Dexter Press, West Nyack, New York; Collection processed by Angela Price
